description: This source file defines a React functional component 'SidebarProjects' that renders a sidebar UI for a robot test automation interface, displaying a list of projects, highlighting the selected project, and handling project selection. It utilizes a custom hook 'useDashboard' for state management.

methods.name: SidebarProjects()
methods.description: React functional component that renders the sidebar with a list of projects, handling user interaction and display based on current dashboard state.
